casebody.data:
Johnson et al., Appellants, v. Administrator, Ohio Bureau of Employment Services, et al., Appellees.

[Cite as Johnson v. Ohio Bur. of Emp. Serv. (1989), 42 Ohio St. 3d 601.]

(No. 87-1956 Submitted February 21, 1989 Decided March 29, 1989.) Thomas L. Sartini, for appellants. Anthony J. Celebrezze, Jr., attorney general, and Sharon D. Tassie, for appellee administrator. Thompson, Hiñe & Flory, Richard V. Whelan, Jr., Michael J. Frantz and Carl H. Gluek, for appellee Ashtabula County Medical Center. Stewart Jaffy & Associates Co., L.P.A., and Stewart R. Jaffy, urging rehearing for Ohio AFL-CIO and United Autoworkers.

On motion for rehearing. Rehearing granted. The issues are to be rebriefed and reargued.

Sweeney, Douglas, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur. Moyer, C.J., Holmes and . Wright, JJ., dissent.
